Player History
Drafted in 16th round, 242nd overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Injured on 6/22/2018 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/17/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $1,950,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/27/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $850,500 per year...
Injured on 9/26/2021 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/13/2022 to a 2-year deal worth $1,444,444 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Brooklyn on 5/12/2022.
Injured on 7/26/2023 with a Broken Foot, out for 4-5 weeks...
